title: Not able to install newest version of Firefox on our iMac (OSX version 10.7).

title: "whats new on firefox" should probably warn users of malicious browsers
content: i just opened Firefox and saw the screen shown in the image below, although i have a problem. Opera is listed as a browser. it is actually spyware and i would like it if you guys did a bit of research to confirm and maybe put a warning sign next to opera so Firefox users can warn opera users to switch browsers
creator: rezinex1

title: Just froze and got logged out for no reason, no tab restore and extensions gone
content: my browser was running insanely slow so i decided to close it out only to open it back up to being logged out, tabs gone (but still synced for now) and at least 1 extension which is now no longer available for download gone! i'm p***ed mostly because the extension (enhancer for youtube) was the only good one of it's kind and now it's gone for absolutely no reason. i did not clear any data or cookies prior to this so why?!
creator: ktneumann

title: Problem with Playback of audiobook
content: About halfway through an Audible audiobook I was listening to, the audiobook stopped, and i got a notice that said: "Please update your browser. Playback is no longer supported on this browser version." But I do have the most recent version of my browser—Firefox—so I don't know how to fix the problem and make the audiobook play again.
creator: elizc100

title: FireFox not logging on the SirusXM
content: I have been trying to logon to my SirusXM account for 30 minutes. I enter the email address for the account and it says it can't find it. Then Find Username link tells me to use the email it can't find. Repeated several times. Even got online with SirusXM chat pop up and they told me to use the email it "can't find". The email is/was typed correctly. The FireFox is the latest update. The OS is Windows 11 (updated) and the hardware is an I9-12900HX, 32 gig laptop. More than adaquate. So on a whim I opened the logon site in Brave and voila got right in. Am I doing something wrong with Firefox?
creator: leoscott
